keywords.DESCRIPTION: Increase the efficiency of the card by #b50%. Can be stacked multiplicatively. Enhance is removed after the card is played.
Remove an upgrade from a card to play a powerful card.
Prevent a card from being exhausted once. Stasis is removed after the card is played.
Grants active and/or passive effect. You can't have more than 10 runes at once.
The power of rune upon creating the rune.
Create a rune using elements. Otherwise, gain that much elements instead.
Elements(Ignis, Terra and Aqua) are spent to craft rune and use for other utilities.
Destroy a rune and activate its effect twice. Passive effects will be removed at the start of your next turn.
Deal damage to all enemies depending on Potency.
